title: Workaround for launching the legacy client
body:
Hey guys, there are currently two ways to go back to the legacy client if you're having issues with the updated client. **This should also fix the issue where your updated client is failing to launch and all you see is an empty black/blue box.**

1- On the login screen of the updated client, click on the "Launch Legacy Client".  - [image](http://imgur.com/IXSuNGG)

2- If you're running into issues launching the updated client and thus cannot click on the "Launch Legacy Client". Follow these steps:

- Go to your League of Legends install folder. Default is (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) go to \RADS\system 
- Locate the user.cfg file and open with notepad
- Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no 
- Save and go to your League install directory and run lol.launcher.exe

Please help us investigate this issue by [**submitting your logs.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#wq12)

Thank you!

Will there be any fix to the updated client not launching?

So we have a lead on one potential cause. You'll see this issue if your League of Legends install is in an aliased folder.  This means that your LoL install or one of its parent folders is either a junction or a symbolic link.  
You might be in this situation if:
 - you are using a shared computer managed by someone else (school computer, PC cafe, etc.)
-  you have a mapped drive
 - you see an arrow in the corner of the folder icon in your League of Legends folder or in any of its parent folders

If you're in this situation, then you should be able to run the updated client by running the file from its unaliased location.

For example, if your LoL install is in "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends", and your "T:\Riot Games" resolves to "C:\Riot Games", then running from "C:\Riot Games" will work, but running from "T:\Riot Games" will not.

if you ask me the legacy league client looks much better than the new updated client.
look at the updated client's friend-list and look at the legacy client's friend-list, in legacy league client everything looks so clear but in updated client it doesn't.
i hope soon i see some hot-fixes.
like: 
-- A new hot-fix that includes the new bug fixes and other problems like while in queue the game is lagging and i see delays but surely its not the problem from my PC that has high performance and can run anything
-- i hope i will be able to see the other player's last seen soon because i can't see that in updated client.

We're investigating players who're not able to launch the updated client but it's not happening broadly so if you're experiencing this, please share your logs with us! 

Also, trying to upgrade again by clicking on the patcher news item may work! {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
what if you're having issues launching the legacy client? the updated one launches fine but is sorta buggy, i cant launch the old client at all anymore however, it crashes as soon as i try to log in.

I cant log in and in turns black when i should be at the login screen and i cant find where lol.launcher.exe is please fix this issue as i really love playing league if you guys manage to fix this ill be as happy as when graves finally gets back his cigar{{champion:104}}
Any suggestions for MACs? I found the file but do now have notepad.  Thanks

You can control + click on the app and click "Show Package Contents"
Go to Contents/LoL/RADS/system
Control + click on the user.cfg and select "Open With" and "Other"
Select TextEdit from your Applications folder

Still doesn't work, and neither does creating icons to directly open the client. It keeps telling me another instance of the launcher is already open, but I can't see it anywhere, not in Activity Monitor or Task Manager.
Update: Suddenly lolclient appeared in the Activity Monitor and I force quit it, now launching the old version from "deploy" works.
Great to hear!

I figured it out!! 
Using the steps to change the code "Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no", I also went to (C:)>Riot Games>League of Legends 
and then i launched the launcher called "lol.launcher.admin.exe" 
it worked for me if i was unable to launch the legacy client from the newer client. 
i hope this works for you guys :)
is there a way to open league normally like before, so i dont have to "launch legacy client" and open league again.

Yup, try the workaround #2 above.

2- If you're running into issues launching the updated client and thus cannot click on the "Launch Legacy Client". Follow these steps:

* Go to your League of Legends install folder. Default is (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) go to \RADS\system
* Locate the user.cfg file and open with notepad
* Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no
* Save and launch League of Legends again.
That's not working for me. It still goes to the beta client even after I make that change
Did you try running it as admin?

I click launch and then League just disappears from everything...like the task manager doesn't even show it. The i click it again and it says that i need to close the old one. so i click ok on the little box then theres just a movable black screen. and i cant launch league again because you cant close a black screen...send help plz
Any fix to games not starting and instead being met with a black screen instead of loading screen?
The inability to resize the window has rendered my game unplayable with the new client.
You can resize the window with CTRL + UP and CTRL + DOWN keys. There are also preset sizes under options.

The new client starts up for me but its just this dark blue square that is there. I cant click on it and when I try closing it and reopening it says i already have one open so i cant try to reopen it.
Thanks! As already stated I was experiencing launch issues to the point where the login credentials never showed up. With this solution I am now back in the game, thanks!
Neither of these work for me. Method 1 just crashes. Method 2, same thing, upon trying to load it... it crashes.

If neither of these work, you may have an issue with your installation. Have you tried re-installing or uninstalling either the legacy client or the updated client recently? 

I'd recommend removing both clients and doing a [**fresh install**](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload) to fix the issue.
my user.cfg file is empty!? please help
If your user.cfg is empty, it usually means you have not selected to upgrade your client. If that's the case you should be able to use the legacy client.
